scripts.build: npm -C hydration run 'build' && npm -C prerender run 'build' && npm -C pages run 'build' && npm -C mdx run 'build' && npm -C headings run 'build' && npm -C prism run 'build' && npm -C icons run 'build' && npm -C iles run 'build'
scripts.build-fast: pnpm -r --parallel --filter . --filter !iles run build -- --no-dts && npm -C iles run build-fast
